name: 1 Mr. Goofy Bird
description:
I'm a goofy bird, I'm just happy, flying joyfully around…BUT this time... Help me reach as high as possible, I need to feed my little chicks.

***How to play***

Tap either side of the screen to make bird fly left or right. Avoid the walls and bricks at all cost.

***
It can be pretty fun ! Enjoy !
P.S. I would greatly appreciate it if you kindly give me some feedback in your review.
